My Second assignment

Hello, my name is _______ _______. This is my second assignment in CSC 193A . The class is completely asynchronous, and I believe it covers full stack programming. I am very excited for this class as I am already proficient in HTML and CSS. I have done my own pet projects to furthen my understanding. The end goal for me was to create a randomizer for a game, I really loved. I achieved mixed results, but I spent about 40 hours learning about the full stack.
